is the outlook for SUNCT Headache ?,There is no cure for these headaches. The disorder is not fatal but can cause considerable discomfort.,NINDS,SUNCT Headache
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for SUNCT Headache ?,"The NINDS conducts a wide range of research on headache disorders. This research aims to discover ways to better diagnose, treat, and ultimately, prevent these disorders.",NINDS,SUNCT Headache
